hero.title: ML & AI Engineering
hero.subtitle: Specializing in MLOps, AI Engineering, and Cloud-Based ML Solutions

about.title: About
about.bio: Machine Learning Engineer with expertise in building scalable ML systems and implementing MLOps practices. Currently working at Globo, previously at Neurotech [B3], with a focus on cloud-based AI solutions and automated ML workflows.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.intro: Comprehensive expertise in modern ML engineering stack, from cloud infrastructure to production AI systems
skills.cloud_desc: Extensive AWS experience (3+ years), currently expanding GCP expertise
skills.ml_production_desc: End-to-end MLOps pipelines, model monitoring, and automated retraining
skills.ai_engineering_desc: LLM integration, multi-agent systems, and production AI applications
skills.data_engineering_desc: Scalable data pipelines, real-time processing, and analytics platforms
